name: WINGSPAN
summary: Wingspan is a competitive, medium-weight, card-driven, engine-building board game from Stonemaier Games. It's designed by Elizabeth Hargrave and features over 170 birds illustrated by Natalia Rojas and Ana Maria Martinez.
info:
• 中文名: 展翅翱翔
  • 别名: WINGSPAN (展翅翱翔)
  • 别名: ウイングスパン
  • 平台: 桌游
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: Engine-building board game
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 5人
  • 发行日期: 2019年3月8日(桌游)
  • 其他发行日期: 2020年9月17日(电子版)
  • 官方网站: https://stonemaiergames.com/games/wingspan/
  • 桌游发行: Stonemaier Games
  • 开发: Monster Couch
  • 发行: Monster Couch , Stonemaier Games, indienova
